About.paragraph: We are building a payments platform that will help local economies thrive by enabling merchants and customers to support one another.

Services.name: No Transaction Fees
Services.text: We do not charge either a merchant or a customer any transaction fee - what a customer pays goes into the pocket of the merchants

Services.name: Loyalty Rewards
Services.text: We enable merchants to personalize discounts to serve the needs of each of their loyal customers

Services.name: Data Insights
Services.text: We anonymize transaction data, build comprehensive insights reports and sell them - this is envisioned to be our main source of revenue

Services.name: How does it work from the customer perspective?
Services.text: Download Salvo app, connect your bank account to Salvo and begin shopping at your favorite local merchants with Salvo

Services.name: How does it work from the merchant perspective?
Services.text: Connect with us, let us onboard you onto the platform.

Services.name: Referrals
Services.text: Please let us know if your favorite local merchant is not on Salvo yet and we will follow up with them. Similarly, if you enjoy using Salvo as a payment method please spread the word
